issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Introduce repartition optimization
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12170](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12170). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To achieve a higher amount of parallelism, automatic repartition can help.
Especially on a single node, a round robin  repartitioning step is almost free while it can improve the amount of parallelism .
